title: Portfolio
description: You're on this right now! Built in 2022 and overhauled as part of my bootcamp at The Jump Digital School.

title: First Level
description: The Frontend for my React project. A dynamic and eye catching video games ecommerce site using the RAWG api, the largest video games database in the world

title: World Wide Weather
description: A vanilla JavaScript project using the Openweather api to display weather for cities around the world and geolocation for local weather

title: Glimpses
description: A freelance project for an arts website for an organisation of art curators in Europe

title: I heart Film
description: A website for an organisation of film producers based in Bahrain. An eye catching grid of videos and use of the vimeo api were fun to build on this project

title: Black Boxes
description: Website for a digital art project called Black Boxes, which I built out the homepage and grid layouts for, including a scrolling ticker tape style line of words

title: Would You Rather
description: Part of my Udacity React Nanodegree, a game of Would You Rather, that allows a user to log in from a pre set list of users, create questions, vote on other questions, and see a leaderboard.

title: Mars Rover Dashboard
description: Part of my Udacity Intermediate Javascript Nanodegree. A dashboard showing the information of 3 different Mars Rovers and an image of the day, consuming data from the Nasa Mars Rover api.

title: Frontend Mentor projects
description: A link to my Front End Mentor profile page, showing a list of completed challenges
